nodes.text: The Tosh family was a Human family from the planet of Naboo. In the last decades of the Galactic Republic, it consisted of Gar Tosh, his wife Plena and their children Jann, Gessle and Trif Tosh. They also had a relative named Pedric Tosh, who had served in the Royal Naboo Security Forces during the Clone Wars. In 19 BBY, Jann Tosh was orphaned when he lost his parents and sibling in a skimmer accident.
